citations.narrative:
During this attempted inspection, the registrant was reached by text message. The registrant stated that this Tennessee
address is not the current address. Registrant was previously cited for not notifying USDA of her address change on
24Aug2023 and was emailed a change of address form to use to notify USDA at that time. Registrant has not notified
USDA of her new address. Transporter registrations are valid only for addresses for which they are issued. The registrant
shall notify USDA Animal Care by certified mail or electronic mail of the change in operations/address within 10 days of
making such change.

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:15am to 11:45
am on 06Mar2024.
No one answered knock or doorbell. Phone call went to voice mail. Text response was that registrant was no longer at
this address.
End Section

narrative:
2.27(a)  Repeat
   
Notification of change of operation. 
During this attempted inspection, the registrant was reached by text message. The registrant stated that this Tennessee 
address is not the current address. Registrant was previously cited for not notifying USDA of her address change on 
24Aug2023 and was emailed a change of address form to use to notify USDA at that time. Registrant has not notified 
USDA of her new address. Transporter registrations are valid only for addresses for which they are issued. The registrant 
shall notify USDA Animal Care by certified mail or electronic mail of the change in operations/address within 10 days of 
making such change. 
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:15am to 11:45 
am on 06Mar2024.  
No one answered knock or doorbell. Phone call went to voice mail. Text response was that registrant was no longer at 
this address. 
 
 
End Section
